ModMetaData.name: Mashed's Lynians
ModMetaData.author: SirMashedPotato
ModMetaData.description:
Adds in all the Lynian races from the Monster Hunter series, as well as an assortment of equipment for them to use.

-Supports Vanilla Achievements Expanded.
-Contains a patch for Medieval Overhaul.
-Contains a patch for Unique and Rare Items.
-Contains a patch for Seeds Please Lite.
-Supports Toddlers by Cyanobot.

- Based on the Monster Hunter series by Capcom.
-Seed bag texture by CitizenKanye
- Thanks to Ranger Rick for some of the achievement names.
